clusterList.phrase: citizen journalism has not been successful on a large scale
to resist economic pressures to make additional cuts which could remove it from the top ranks of american journalism

cost cutting alone is not a good enough strategy while locally we are seeing investigative journalism taking a back seat in the us cost cutting is not affecting investigative journalism which is seen as a unique benefit instead certain categories of jobs are being cut we're seeing photographers and subs leaving newsrooms while more shrewd newspapers are reinvesting the wall street journal is investing in online subs online video and other web skills
